title: Stage Lv5-P4-S15
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I tend to think that way.
It seems to me that way.
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I tend to think that way.
It seems to me that way.

sentences.kr: 제 생각에는 더 나은 방법이 있을 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: I have a feeling that there might be a better way.

sentences.kr: 아마도 다른 접근법을 시도해볼 만할 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: Perhaps we might want to try a different approach.

sentences.kr: 제 개인적인 의견으로는 조금 어려울 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: In my personal view, it might be a bit challenging.
I wonder if we might want to reconsider.

sentences.kr: 저로서는 좀 더 시간이 필요할 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: I have a sense that we might need more time.

sentences.kr: 제가 보기에는 다른 선택지도 있을 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: It appears to me that there might be other options.
